title: RazorKeyboard in game
body:
Hi I have a problem where sometimes in game my keyboard doesn't work. My ability's, Sums{{summoner:4}} , and active items like trinkets and pots dont work. i would have to rebind my keyboard to Ctrl q,w,e,r,d,f etc...  When this happens I disconnect from the game unplug and re-plug in my keyboard and prays it works because sometimes it doesn't. I dont know is this is a problem in game bc this is the only game this happens on or its a keyboard problem. 
 
Any advice or help will be appreciated {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
It could be a setting corruption causing this, the keyboard itself should be the problem unless there's hardware malfunction.  See if a config reset might help here:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Try swapping another keyboard as well and possibly closing Synapse to help rule out possibilities.

Are you using Razer Synapse to change any of your keys, or are you changing them using the LoL client? When modifying your hotkeys, it's possible that you might have unbound or changed a key without realizing it. It's also possible that your hotkeys are conflicting and not doing what you're expecting it to do. Or is the issue occurring when you have all default settings? If it was the first case, I would restore default settings and seeing how it responds.
